Items.Details: Initializes a new Yarn project by creating a package.json file in the current directory
Installs a package as a dependency for your project; if no version is specified
Installs a specific version of a package as a dependency for your project
Installs a package as a development dependency for your project
Upgrades all dependencies to their latest versions
Upgrades a specific package to its latest version
Upgrades a specific package to the specified version
Removes a package from your project's dependencies
Installs all dependencies for your project based on the versions listed in the package.json and yarn.lock files
Displays a hierarchical view of your project's dependencies
Shows information about a package including its description
Installs a package globally on your system
Removes a globally installed package from your system
Displays a list of all globally installed packages on your system
Runs a script defined in your package.json file
Removes all packages from the Yarn cache directory to free up space
Displays the path to the Yarn cache directory
Lists all packages stored in the Yarn cache directory
Sets a Yarn configuration option
Displays the value of a Yarn configuration option
Deletes a Yarn configuration option
Displays the current Yarn configuration
Displays help information for a specific Yarn command
